headline: The Rise of Edge Compute: The Video
keywords: Developers, Community, Events, Video, Cloudflare Apps, Cloudflare Meetups, Serverless, Cloudflare Workers, MeetUp
description: At the end of March, Kenton Varda, tech lead and architect for Cloudflare Workers, traveled to London and led a talk about the Rise of Edge Compute where he laid out our vision for the future of the Internet as a platform.
